Trigger.Name: 2 Sigma "/e _test sigma"
Trigger.Description: 1 cross 2 triangle 3 chain1 4 attack1 5 attack2 6 ignore1 7 ignore2 8 chain2

Trigger.Name: 3 Omega "/e _test omega" (will go through both patterns, takes about 50 seconds to complete!)
Trigger.Description:
marks (first set) 1 - attack2 2 - bind1 3 - attack1 4 - ignore1 5 - triangle 6 - plus 7 - ignore2 8 - bind2
marks (second set) 1 - bind1 2 - attack2 3 - triangle 4 - ignore1 5 - ignore2 6 - attack1 7 - bind2 8 - plus

Folder.Name: *copy to local* - READ INSTRUCTIONS TO CUSTOMIZE

Trigger.Name: Dynamis Mark Players
Trigger.Description: v1.0 - release 3/14 adds version number to debug line incorporates force telesto list repopulate on reset which should improve performance of the test triggers. no longer required to use /e _reset before any tests. adds option to add configurable delays between marks adds option to customize marker assignments
